name: Braised Octopus
recipeIngredient: 1 large octopus, about 6 pounds, cleaned, body discarded, tentacles cut into 1/2-inch chunks
3 cups fresh tomatoes, peeled, seeded and minced
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large, heavy pot over medium heat, warm the olive oil. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook about 2 minutes. Add the chili-pepper flakes and the octopus. Cover. Lower heat. Braise until tender, about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, stirring frequently.
Add tomatoes and stir well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir, cover and simmer for 10 more minutes. Add parsley. Serve with grilled country bread.
